name: note-taker-2
description: The note Taker is a simple application that allows you to create, edit, and delete your personal notes. The data is then stored into a JSON data base file which can be easily retrieved once the appplication is opened.  ## Usage 1. User will open the website and be presented with a simple home screen. Press the button to enter into the website and the user will be presented with the note taker application.
